snippet.title: Rogue Lords | PC Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Rogue Lords to your Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1069690/Rogue_Lords/

On September 30, Darkness will fall on mortal lands with the release of Rogue Lords on PC!

Rogue Lords is a dark fantasy roguelike where you play as the Devil! Lead famous evil geniuses through events and turn-based fights to spread terror and corruption. Create synergies between your disciples, use your evil powers and take revenge on those miserable Demon Hunters.

#RogueLords will be available September 30, 2021 on PC through Steam and the Epic Games Store and at a later date on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.
-------------------------------
